text:
[Verse]
Night sky shining bright
Dreams take flight through the night
Stars aligned just right
Chasing the moonlight

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the air
Hearts feeling no despair
Laughter everywhere
Hands raised without a care

[Chorus]
Chase the moon high above
Feel the magic feel the love
Underneath the stars we move
In the night our spirits prove

[Verse 3]
Footprints in the sand
Dancing to an unseen band
Hold me close take my hand
Let's explore this promised land

[Bridge]
Lights shine bright from afar
We’re bound by who we are
Wishing on every star
In this moment nothing's bizarre

[Verse 4]
Eyes twinkling in sync
Destinies on the brink
No time now to rethink
Dive into the night’s ink
title: Chasing the Moon
